overview:
Marc-Oliver is an award-winning Designer specializing in web and mobile experience design, art direction and social media strategy.

He worked for the worlds most creative digital agencies like Electronic Arts, Neue Digitale, Razorfish, Syzygy and Pixelpark where he developed innovative visual concepts (link to Slideshare) and ideas for Mercedes Benz, adidas, Olympus, Philip Morris, AOL, Germanwings, Yellostrom and T-Mobile. Just to name a few.

He is currently in charge of the Art Direction and User Experience of two digital products at EA SPORTS Online in Vancouver. His research focuses specifically on the strategic and creative interplay between web experiences, game mechanics and mobile apps as it impacts the overall online brand strategy of a company and organization in a highly digitized era.
